an8.69:4.3: Khattiyaparisā, brāhmaṇaparisā, gahapatiparisā, samaṇaparisā, cātumahārājikaparisā, tāvatiṃsaparisā, māraparisā, brahmaparisā.
an8.69:4.4: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, anekasataṃ khattiyaparisaṃ upasaṅkamitā.
an8.69:4.5: Tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpannapubbā.
an8.69:4.6: Tattha yādisako tesaṃ vaṇṇo hoti tādisako mayhaṃ vaṇṇo hoti, yādisako tesaṃ saro hoti tādisako mayhaṃ saro hoti.
an8.69:4.7: Dhammiyā ca kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṃsemi.
an8.69:4.9: ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:4.10: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā antaradhāyāmi.
an8.69:4.12: ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:5.1: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, anekasataṃ brāhmaṇaparisaṃ … pe …
an8.69:5.8: Tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpannapubbā.
an8.69:5.9: Tattha yādisako tesaṃ vaṇṇo hoti tādisako mayhaṃ vaṇṇo hoti, yādisako tesaṃ saro hoti tādisako mayhaṃ saro hoti.
an8.69:5.10: Dhammiyā ca kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṃsemi.
an8.69:5.12: ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:5.13: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā antaradhāyāmi.
an8.69:5.15: ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito devo vā manusso vā’ti.
